sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
StatementsAndDeclarations are a list of statements and declarations. For example, a Turing program consists of a list of statements and declarations. The body of a procedure is a list of statements and declarations.

Each statementOrDeclaration is one of:

See also statement and declaration.
sections.mdown_content:
*StatementsAndDeclarations *are a list of statements and declarations. For example, a Turing program consists of a list of statements and declarations. The body of a procedure is a list of statements and declarations.
Each *statementOrDeclaration* is one of:


See also statement and declaration.

sections.title: Example
code:
var name : string
        name := "Frank"
        put "Hello ", name
sections.raw_content: This list of statements and declarations is a Turing program that outputs Hello Frank.
sections.mdown_content: This list of statements and declarations is a Turing program that outputs *Hello Frank*.
